mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Promoboard(bno, writer, key, content, area, place, regdate, limitation1, limitation2, limitation3, filecnt) VALUES(promoboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{key}, #{content}, #{area}, #{place}, sysdate, #{limitation1}, #{limitation2}, #{limitation3}, #{filecnt})
mapper.select: SELECT pr.* , u.filenum FROM promoboard pr LEFT JOIN users u ON pr.writer = u.username WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE promoboard SET content = #{content}, area = #{area}, place = #{place}, limitation1 = #{limitation1}, limitation2 = #{limitation2}, limitation3 = #{limitation3}, regdate = sysdate, ismod ='1' WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO promoboardlike (bno, userid, lno) VALUES(#{bno}, #{userid}, promoboardlike_seq.NEXTVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM promoboardlike WHERE bno=#{bno} AND userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM promoboardlike WHERE bno=#{bno} AND userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT bno FROM promoboardlike WHERE userid=#{userid}
